name: Slime Defender (TuxedoKing)
description:
Slime Defender is a game about defending your colony of space penguins from the slimes that inhabit this foreign planet. Connect to a power node to siphon the power out of your UFO to charge the dying nodes while defending them from hungry slimes who steal the power. Running out of power? Tether yourself to your enemies to steal the power they have stored up inside! (Everyone knows slimes are 87% raw electricity). 

Controls (can be found in game)

Move: WASD

Dash: Left Shift (Drains power)

Charge a node: Connect with the node by maintaining line of sight with it. The node will siphon your power automatically while you are connected, keeping it charged!

Steal power from Red Slimes: Press and hold right click in the general direction of the slime. Cannot be connected to a node. Nodes take priority.

Shoot: Hold left click. Cannot shoot and steal power at the same time. Can shoot and charge a node at the same time.

Pro tip: Use the mini map to your advantage to keep your eyes on far away nodes! Penguins make the best radar technicians!
